title.zh: 建元已來王子侯者年表
title.en: Chronicle of Princes and Marquis since Jianyuan

sentences.zh: 制詔御史：「諸侯王或欲推私恩分子弟邑者，令各條上，朕且臨定其號名。」

translations.literal: Imperial Edict to the Imperial Secretary: 'When nobles and kings wish to bestow private favor by dividing fiefs to younger brothers and sons, let each one memorialize separately. I will personally determine their titles and names.'

Imperial Edict to the Imperial Secretary: 'When nobles and kings wish to bestow private favor by dividing fiefs to younger brothers and sons, let each one memorialize separately. I will personally determine their titles and names.'

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：盛哉，天子之德！

translations.literal: The Grand Historian said: How flourishing is the virtue of the Son of Heaven!
When one person has good fortune, the whole empire relies on it.
The Grand Historian said: How flourishing is the virtue of the Son of Heaven! When one person has good fortune, the whole empire relies on it.

cells.literal: Son of Prince Xian of Hejian

cells.content: 二。五年正月壬子，侯劉明元年。
cells.literal: Two. Fifth year, first month, renzi day: Marquis Liu Ming first year.

cells.content: 二。三年，侯明坐謀反殺人，棄市，國除。
cells.literal: Two. Third year: Marquis Ming convicted of plotting rebellion and murder, executed in market, state abolished.
Son of Prince Ding of Changsha

cells.content: 一。六年七月乙巳，思侯劉蒼元年。
cells.literal: One. Sixth year, seventh month, yisi day: Marquis Si Liu Cang first year.

Son of Prince Ding of Changsha

cells.content: 一。六年七月乙巳，侯劉成元年。

cells.content: 四。五年，侯成坐酎金，國除。
cells.literal: Four. Fifth year: Marquis Cheng convicted of tribute gold deficiency, state abolished.
Son of Prince Ding of Changsha.
